_sText:
The long awaited counterpart to surf_aphelion is finally here!
Only took 7 months for me to finish....

Higher speeds, 5k maxvel, smoother surf and large ramps; This map intentionally positions itself opposite to its predecessor.
This is reflected in the chosen name. 'Perihelion' is the name given to the lowest point of an orbit around the sun,
where the distance to the sun is smallest and speeds are very high, whereas 'Aphelion' describes the other extreme.

Linear T6~ (might be T5 on 66 Tick by "modern" tiering standards but I guess thats up to servers. 64 Tick surely is T6 no doubt.)

Bonus 1 by Sully
Bonus 4 by Duchess

Info about zones and tonemap values in the zip.
